title: How long does it take to respond to a ticket?
body: Whats going on? Have been w8ing over 5 many days after I posted my ticket about my patching issues. Last time I posted about another technical issue, I got a response within 24 hrs?

replies.body:
We've been pretty slammed with tickets lately, so there may be a bit of a delay in getting back to you. I can assure you that our support team is working their butts off and will get back to you as soon as they can.

Let me know if you have any questions.
And any chance you can help me with my issue yourself? Sorry if I'm bothering, I'm just really eager to get back in the game.

Alright thx. Perhaps an estimated wait time? Really exhausted on weekends, would like nothing more than to just relax and hit up a few matches with my main. {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} Like will it take another week or so? Or maybe in a few days?
